Is the left-most pedal on a grand piano called the una corda?	yes

Why are upright pianos more compact?	Upright pianos are more compact because the frame and strings are vertical.

Do older pianos have more keys than modern pianos?	no.

What are the names of a piano's pedals?	Piano pedals from left to right: una corda, sostenuto, and damper.
